name: Vegan Chocolate Sheet Cake
description: This is the most amazing vegan chocolate sheet cake! Fluffy, moist chocolate cake is baked in a half sheet pan and topped with an amazing buttery sweet icing. Sprinkle with chopped nuts, if desired.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup soy milk (or other non-dairy milk)
1/2 cup canola oil (or melted coconut oil)
1/3 cup soy milk (or other non-dairy milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and grease an 11 x 17 inch sheet pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and grease an 11 x 17 inch sheet pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Measure 1 cup soy milk and add the tablespoon of vinegar to it. Stir slightly and set aside to curdle.
recipeInstructions.name: Measure 1 cup soy milk and add the tablespoon of vinegar to it. Stir slightly and set aside to curdle.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Whisk well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Whisk well to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: To the bowl with the dry ingredients, pour in the milk/vinegar mixture, oil, applesauce and vanilla. With a hand mixer (you can skip the mixer and use a large spoon if you need to), mix on medium speed until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: To the bowl with the dry ingredients, pour in the milk/vinegar mixture, oil, applesauce and vanilla. With a hand mixer (you can skip the mixer and use a large spoon if you need to), mix on medium speed until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully add the cup of boiling hot water, and mix on low speed until combined. The batter will seem runny, but that is right. It is what makes this cake extra moist and delicious.
recipeInstructions.name: Carefully add the cup of boiling hot water, and mix on low speed until combined. The batter will seem runny, but that is right. It is what makes this cake extra moist and delicious.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the cake batter into the prepared sheet pan, and bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Remove from the oven and make the frosting.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the cake batter into the prepared sheet pan, and bake in the oven for 20-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Remove from the oven and make the frosting.

recipeInstructions.text: When the cake is done baking, make the frosting: In a medium pot, add the vegan butter, cocoa, soy milk and vanilla. Warm over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the butter has melted and the mixture comes to a simmer. Immediately remove from heat and whisk in the powdered sugar, gradually, until the frosting is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: When the cake is done baking, make the frosting: In a medium pot, add the vegan butter, cocoa, soy milk and vanilla. Warm over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the butter has melted and the mixture comes to a simmer. Immediately remove from heat and whisk in the powdered sugar, gradually, until the frosting is smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the warm frosting over the still warm cake, spreading evenly with a spatula or spoon. Sprinkle with optional nuts, if using.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the warm frosting over the still warm cake, spreading evenly with a spatula or spoon. Sprinkle with optional nuts, if using.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the cake and frosting cool for at least 30 minutes if possible before slicing and serving. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Let the cake and frosting cool for at least 30 minutes if possible before slicing and serving. Enjoy!

keywords: chocolate sheet cake, texas sheet cake, vegan sheet cake
